INSERT INTO FG_POST (FG_POST_ID, FG_POST_TYPE, FG_POST_TITLE, FG_USER_CODE) VALUES (#{postId}, 'inquiry', #{postTitle}, #{userCode})
mapper.select: SELECT p.FG_POST_ID AS postId, p.FG_POST_TITLE AS postTitle, TO_CHAR(p.FG_POST_CREATED_AT, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS postCreatedAt, CASE i.FG_INQUIRY_STATUS WHEN '0' THEN '확인중' WHEN '1' THEN '답변완료' END AS inquiryStatus FROM FG_POST p, FG_INQUIRY i WHERE p.FG_POST_ID = i.FG_POST_ID AND p.FG_USER_CODE = #{userCode} ORDER BY p.FG_POST_CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT p.FG_POST_TITLE AS postTitle, b.FG_BUSINESS_NAME AS businessName, TO_CHAR(p.FG_POST_CREATED_AT, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS postCreatedAt, i.FG_INQUIRY_CONTENT AS inquiryContent FROM FG_POST p, FG_BUSINESS b, FG_INQUIRY i WHERE p.FG_POST_ID = i.FG_POST_ID AND p.FG_USER_CODE = b.FG_USER_CODE AND p.FG_POST_ID = #{postId}

SELECT TO_CHAR(c.FG_COMMENT_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS commentDate, c.FG_COMMENT_CONTENT AS commentContent, CASE c.FG_COMMENT_EDIT WHEN '0' THEN ' ' WHEN '1' THEN '수정됨' END AS commentEdit FROM FG_POST p, FG_COMMENT c WHERE p.FG_POST_ID = c.FG_POST_ID AND p.FG_POST_ID = #{postId}
